biography.bio: Fai-Hung Chan is an actor and writer, known for Fallen Angels (1995), Jiang Hu: The Triad Zone (2000) and Now You See It, Now You Don't (1992).
biography.name: Fai-Hung Chan

biography.bio: Jordan Chan was born on July 8, 1967 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for Ip Man: Le combat final (2013), Trivisa (2016) and Big Bullet (1996). He has been married to Cherrie Ying since February 14, 2010. They have one child.
biography.name: Jordan Chan

biography.bio: Alfred Cheung was born on January 1, 1955. He is an actor and writer, known for Le médaillon (2003), Biao jie, ni hao ye! (1990) and Biao jie, ni hao ye! xu ji (1991).
biography.name: Alfred Cheung

biography.bio: Chun Hung Cheung is an actor, known for Running Out of Time (1999), High Risk (1995) and The Eight Immortals Restaurant: The Untold Story (1993).
biography.name: Chun Hung Cheung

biography.bio: Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung is an actor and director, known for In the Mood for Love (2000), Infernal Affairs II (2003) and Comrades: Almost a Love Story (1996).
biography.name: Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung

biography.bio: Raymond Cho was born on October 16, 1964 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Wing-Lim Cho. He is an actor, known for Full Alert (1997), Chui gik ji sau (2001) and Look for a Star (2009).
biography.name: Raymond Cho

biography.bio: Raven Choi is an actor, known for Espion amateur (2001), Double Tap (2000) and High Risk (1995).
biography.name: Raven Choi

biography.bio: Jason Chu is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous 3 (1996), Young and Dangerous (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996).
biography.name: Jason Chu

biography.bio: Mimi Chu was born on October 26, 1954 in Ipoh, Perak, Malaysia as Choo Yit Mei. She is an actress, known for Un couple explosif (1992), Blind Detective (2013) and Sixty Million Dollar Man (1995).
biography.name: Mimi Chu

biography.bio: Danny Chung is a composer and actor, known for Happy Together (1997), As Tears Go By (1988) and Zui hou sheng li (1987).
biography.name: Danny Chung

biography.bio: Ka-Fai Ho is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous (1996), Beyond Our Ken (2004) and Yit huet jui keung (1997).
biography.name: Ka-Fai Ho

biography.bio: Born in Hong Kong, Peter's father died when he was nine years-old. After attending primary school, he never commenced secondary school and started working at the age of ten. Peter was 26 when he worked as a chauffeur by day and started writing his own column in a weekly newspaper in his spare time. After writing the lyrics to a local Chinese pop song, he decided to have it published in his column. His lyrics drew the attention of a reader who then forwarded it to a famous male local actor in a late-night television variety show. The actor, putting words to the melody, performed an impromptu version of the popular song live on television, two nights in a row. The performance drew the attention of the popular cantopop singer Sam Hui who then teamed up with him to create, at the time, one of the most dynamic composer and lyrics writer duo. From famous lyrics writer, Peter subsequently ventured into both television and film acting. The rest they say, is history.
biography.name: Bei-Dak Lai

biography.bio: Chiu-Wing Lam is an actor and writer, known for Vulgaria (2012), Shaolin Basket (2008) and Dancing Lion (2007).
biography.name: Chiu-Wing Lam

biography.bio: Jerry Lamb was born on September 29, 1970 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for 3 go shou shang de jing cha (1996), Young and Dangerous 3 (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996). He has been married to Lily Hong since December 19, 2002. They have two children.
biography.name: Jerry Lamb

biography.bio: Bowie Lau is a producer and director, known for The Deadly Camp (1999), To Seduce an Enemy (2003) and Electrical Girl (2001).
biography.name: Bowie Lau
